description:
Accessorize your ride and stay hydrated, all at the same time. Molded from polycarbonate, the Fly cage is light, strong and looks great on all types of bikes, from enduro sleds to carbon racers, it even works on kids bikes.

  • Polycarbonate is light and strong
  • “Wings” hold your bottle securely
name: Supacaz Fly Poly Bottle Cage
